summary.span: 同步處理游標和使用者介面。

span.span: Synchronizes the cursor and the user interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可能要尋找游標位於上的項目。Applications may need to locate the element that the cursor is positioned over. 如果應用程式使用動畫，方法可能會傳回從資料指標已經移出的項目。If the application uses animation, the method might return an element that has moved out from under the cursor. 呼叫來確定傳回適當的項目。Call to be sure that returns the proper element. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何傳回游標下的項目。The following example demonstrates how to return an element that is under the cursor. 呼叫可確保傳回正確的項目。Calling ensures that returns the correct element. [!code-csharp[StylusSamples#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/CSharp/Window2.xaml.cs#24)] [!code-vb[StylusSamples#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/VisualBasic/Window2.xaml.vb#24)] [!code-csharp[StylusSamples#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/CSharp/Window2.xaml.cs#26)] [!code-vb[StylusSamples#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/VisualBasic/Window2.xaml.vb#26)]
